title: Enhanced Game of the Day - No Access for Lite Users
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is a Lite user
and taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps to expand MLB PLUS Game of the Day

custom_steps_separated.content: taps the away feed on iPad
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: taps the home feed on iPad
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: taps the MLB Plus feed on iPad
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: taps the away feed on iPhone
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: taps the home feed on iPhone
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: taps the MLB Plus feed on iPhone
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - No Access for Single Team Users
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is a single team account
and taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps to expand MLB PLUS Game of the Day

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall
Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - Access for Premium Users
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with an At Bat account
and attempts to access the Enhanced Game of the Day

custom_steps_separated.expected: and the Enhanced Game of the Day feed will begin
and the Enhanced Game of the Day feed will begin

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - Configurable Message on Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given the user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Scoreboard
and the Enhanced Game of the Day feed is available on that day

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Enhanced Game of the Day text is displayed as the same as existing FGoD
Then the Enhanced Game of the Day text is displayed as the same as existing FGoD

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - Configurable Message on MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is on the MLB.TV EPG
and an Enhanced Game of the Day is available

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Enhanced Game of the Day text is displayed as the same as existing FGoD
Then the Enhanced Game of the Day text is displayed as the same as existing FGoD

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - MLB.TV EPG Button
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is on the MLB.TV EPG
and taps on the game that is the Enhanced Game of the Day
and the game feeds are available

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should not display the TV call signs
and it should display Enhanced

Then the button should not display the TV call signs
and it should display Enhanced

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - Local (In-market) Blackout
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When an At Bat user taps on the Enhanced Game of the Day feed button
and the feed is a local (in-market) team

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will received a Blackout Message
Then the user will received a Blackout Message

title: Enhanced Game of the Day - Executive Account
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with an executive account
and the user taps on the Enhanced Feed of the Day feed button
and the game feed is local (in-market) team

custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the feed will launch
and no Blackout message

then the feed will launch
and no Blackout message
